reqCond.para: Aircraft on ground, hydraulics pressurized, NAVSYS aligned.

reqSafety.para: Ensure control surfaces clear. Observe MAL-EEM guidance on crew safety.

step.para: Power AFCS partitions; verify BIT pass.
Engage AP in HDG and ALT hold; verify AP annunciations on PFD/HMI.
Command small roll/pitch changes; verify authority limits and reversion logic.
Disengage AP via yoke switch; confirm aural/visual warnings.

reqResult.para: All annunciations and responses nominal; logs captured to UTCS evidence.
